title: Legacy Of Kain Deficiance PC-CompactedPortable
description:
Hi to all PC games fans and in particularly to the Legacy of Kain addicts ...


This file have the Legacy of Kain Deficiance game in a single executable
that can be used by compacted portability method, more information below ...



This is the instructions to run the game :



run CompactedPortableStarter and in less than 2 minutes
the game will start 

after playing and quitting game the saves will be at mydocuments
folder on "Legacy Of Kain - Deficiance" folder and the executable
is deleted 

so, for every single time launching the game is less than 2 minutes
and only 730 mb on the hard drive to have the game ready to go...

of course that if for one side is not immediatly the launching of the game,
for other side because to start is needed to wait a little time the
hard disc space to play this game is about 60% less, 
the portable executable have 1.71 Gb and the compacted portable 730 Mb ...
so close 1 Gb less at the hard drive to have this game ready to play,
the only thing is to wait about 2 minutes for each launch of the game but thatÃ‚Â´s it ...
the trick is when you want to play you really mean it !!!

GETTING THE COMPACTED PORTABLE EXECUTABLE OFF OPTION

Anyway is a procedure to get the portable executable to quick launch but spending
of course 1,71 GB on the Hard Drive that it is after the game start click at the 
windows button then goes to the game directory and copy the 1,71 Gb executable to
the desktop for example, of course that when you will finish to play or quitting
the game at the game menu the executable will be deleted but you already have
a copy of the full executable available somewhere to play quickly ...
so, basically the compressed executable portable is ok if you donÃ‚Â´t mind to
wait a couple of minutes to the game begin, just that ...

Happy game ...
